means: 发出粗厉的叫声，咯咯地叫

sentence.Network_en: She gave a loud squawk when the water was poured on her.
sentence.Network_cn: 水泼到她身上时，她大叫了一声。
他像嗓子被勒住似的嘎叫了一声。

sentence.Network_en: The hen gave a squawk when It'saw the cat.
sentence.Network_cn: 母鸡见到猫时咯咯叫了起来.

...播出，共有15个栏目，最长的栏目是长达3个小时的《财经论谈》（Squawk Box），包括下午2个小时的《美国早市》（The Call） …

entry.def: When a bird squawks, it makes a loud harsh noise.

example.ex: I threw pebbles at the hens, and that made them jump and squawk.
example.tran: 我朝母鸡扔卵石，吓得它们乱跳乱叫。

entry.def: If a person squawks, they complain loudly, often in a high-pitched, harsh tone.

example.ex: Mr Arbor squawked that the deal was a double-cross...
example.tran: 阿伯先生大声抱怨说这笔交易是个骗局。

example.ex: 'Wait for me!' Melanie squawked. 'I'm not staying here alone.'
example.tran: “等等我！”梅拉尼粗声抗议道，“我不想一个人呆在这里。”

sentences.sentence: "I have a gripe about the service here"

auth_sentence.content: Tequila didn't give sworn testimony but he did give squawk testimony.
auth_sentence.res_content: Tequila didn't give sworn testimony but he did give squawk testimony.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Tequila didn't give sworn testimony but he did give squawk testimony.

auth_sentence.content: I have been there myself - microphone primed for that dying squawk and crunch of bone and feathers.
auth_sentence.res_content: I have been there myself - microphone primed for that dying squawk and crunch of bone and feathers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I have been there myself - microphone primed for that dying squawk and crunch of bone and feathers.

auth_sentence.content: Yet they are quick enough to squawk when they are on the wrong end of a Tom Daley special.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet they are quick enough to squawk when they are on the wrong end of a Tom Daley special.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet they are quick enough to squawk when they are on the wrong end of a Tom Daley special.

sentences.en: The hen gave a squawk when it saw the cat.
sentences.cn: 母鸡见到猫时咯咯叫了起来。

means.word_mean: 发出粗厉的叫声, 咯咯地叫

sentences.en: As the fox came into the yard, the chickens began squawking in alarm.
sentences.cn: 当狐狸闯进院子的时候, 小鸡们惊恐地开始大叫起来。
